DataElement.preferredName: Family Medical History Speech And Language Impairment Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Chronological record of health and disease events of family members and ancestors. (WEBS84)_Speech; the exchange of spoken words._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures._Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Chronological record of health and disease events of family members and ancestors. (WEBS84)

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.
